globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The rangers make steady and silent progress towards the Imperial target through the swampy Ithor landscape. But for all their skill, you can't shake the feeling that you are being followed.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: A ranger interrupts your thoughts, "Stay focused. We've scouted the area, and there are hidden tunnels through the brush you can use to make an approach."

entityProperties.name: Tunnel Red 1
entityProperties.theText:
A tunnel leads through the brush, hidden from Imperial eyes.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A Rebel figure can spend 1 movement point to move from a tunnel to another tunnel of the same color.

entityProperties.name: Tunnel Red 2
entityProperties.theText:
A tunnel leads through the brush, hidden from Imperial eyes.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A Rebel figure can spend 1 movement point to move from a tunnel to another tunnel of the same color.

eventActions.theText: {-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A Rebel figure can spend 1 movement point to move from a tunnel to another tunnel of the same color.

The ranger shoulders her weapon. "You get in; we'll provide the cover fire."

{-} The mission will progress when a door is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A Rebel figure can spend 1 movement point to move from a tunnel to another tunnel of the same color.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when a door is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
"Ace work!" a ranger congratulates you over the comlink. "Meet back at the rendezvous point. We'll make sure you're not followed this time."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Alliance Rangers as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Overwhelmed by the Imperial forces protecting this relay station, you flee into the swamps for extraction. You lose a few rangers to blaster fire as they stay to cover your escape.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Open Door North
globalEvents.eventText: Pushing through vines, you take a breath and breach the door.

entityProperties.name: Door North
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial communications facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

globalEvents.name: Open Door South
globalEvents.eventText: Pushing through vines, you take a breath and breach the door.

entityProperties.name: Door South
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial communications facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Terminal 1
globalEvents.eventText: The comm station collapses in a shower of sparks.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial comm station is humming softly as it transmits and receives data.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack the terminal (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the defense results if 1 or more Imperial figures are on or adjacent to the terminal.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Terminal 2
globalEvents.eventText: The comm station collapses in a shower of sparks.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 2
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial comm station is humming softly as it transmits and receives data.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack the terminal (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the defense results if 1 or more Imperial figures are on or adjacent to the terminal.

globalEvents.name: Cover Fire
globalEvents.eventText: From hidden positions, blaster shots rains down on your enemies as your ranger allies start to provide cover fire.

eventActions.theText: Immediately, a stormtrooper patrol arrives to deal with the new complications.

globalEvents.name: On their Heels
globalEvents.eventText: As you steadily advance toward the communications facility, you hear a growl behind as two Trandoshans emerge from the brush.

globalEvents.name: Final Surge
globalEvents.eventText: Inside lies a well-equipped communications facility.

eventActions.theText: Two terminals appear to coordinate the relay's equipment.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial comm station is humming softly as it transmits and receives data.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack the terminal (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the defense results if 1 or more Imperial figures are on or adjacent to the terminal.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the defense results if 1 or more Imperial figures are on or adjacent to that terminal.
{-} The Rebels win when both terminals are destroyed.
Be on or adjacent to the terminal with the fewest Imperial figures on or adjacent to it.
Hostile forces interrupt your inspection with threats and weapons.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A Rebel figure can spend 1 movement point to move from a tunnel to another tunnel of the same color.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the defense results if 1 or more Imperial figures are on or adjacent to that terminal.
{-} The Rebels win when both terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
